text.__SUMMARY__: Solanum hypocalycosarcum is a species of plant in the family Solanaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador.
text.Sources: Montúfar, R. & Pitman, N. (2004). "Solanum hypocalycosarcum". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2004: e.T46334A11049705. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2004.RLTS.T46334A11049705.en. Retrieved 18 December 2017.
